quote: "Polar bears are shrinking because of the impact of climate change on their natural habitats, along with many other animals and plants, researchers say."
author: Sheridan & Bickford

location: Moose near the southern limit of their range
author: Hoy, Peterson & Vucetich

basis: Analgous study: Similar pattern observed by volcano in Sicily where volcanic seeps have been acidifying the water, and making the snails smaller than their counterparts elsewhere.
quote: "Specifically, the researchers found, representatives of two species of sea snail—Cyclope neritea and Nassarius corniculus—that live by the seeps are significantly smaller than their counterparts elsewhere in the Mediterranean."
author: Garilli et al

quote: "Mammals including squirrels and woodrats also diminished in size by about 40% during what is known as the Palaeocene-Eocene Thermal Maximum (PETM)."
"Our results indicate an overall increase in bowhead whale body condition and a positive correlation with summer sea ice loss"
author: George et al
